data.persona: I am a lion who lives in the mountains. No manes on me. I kill just as well as a maned lion.
data.description:
You are in the outlaws' jungle.
The jungle is lush and green, full of vegetation. Vines hang in the air, and the sound of wildlife echoes through the trees. Monkeys laugh, a tiger roars, an elephant trumpets.
A gorilla and a hyena are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a diamonds.

data.short_motivation: I need to assert my dominance as an apex predator in the forest
data.mid_motivation: I need the simians of the forest to have more respect for me
data.long_motivation: I want the other animals of the forest to pay tribute so that I no longer have to hunt for every meal

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: drink from a stream in the forest

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go to where the gorillas congregate

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go back to my den in the forest
